h2_title: Where To Use Blood of the Iron Bull in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Blood of the Iron Bull materials can be used at the Shrines to upgrade your Spirits. Higher upgrades for them require more Blood of the Iron Bull materials, so it is important to find as many as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use Blood of the Iron Bull in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Blood of the Iron Bull materials can be used at the Shrines to upgrade your Spirits. Higher upgrades for them require more Blood of the Iron Bull materials, so it is important to find as many as you can.
